Home Ontario Restaurants Waterloo Restaurants University Garden Chinese Cuisine Be the first to add a photo! Upload
University Garden Chinese Cuisine 4.0 stars ( 21 reviews, average rating: 4.1/5) Cuisines: Asian , Chinese (519) 569-7588 425 University E Waterloo , ON N2K 4C9 Neighbourhoods: Waterloo East
Write a Review Map it!
Yes No Recommend Restaurant? 28 people have voted 57% of voters recommend Bloglink! If you've reviewed this place on your blog, Add your review to this page! Restaurant Details Price range $$ ($11-$25) Are you the owner? Claim this restaurant now! Incorrect business info? Let us know! Restaurant Reviews 21 lhutz
1 2 3 next 2 Reviews 2 months ago Best Chinese in Waterloo Reviewed by Chrisgo Overall 4.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 4.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 2
Ordered take out (Sunday). Ordering was easy ~ the man taking my order was very friendly. We had it delivered in a very reasonable time - 30mins. Delivery was extra $$ but a fair rate. Food was hot, ingredients were fresh and delicious! Every dish was cooked perfectly. Excellent meal. Order: Moo Goo Gai Pan, Tai Dop Voy, BeanSprout Lo Mein, S&S Chicken Balls, Steamed Rice Comment (0) 1 Review 4 months ago We came here to just try it out because our... Reviewed by kathy Overall 5.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 5.0 stars Atmosphere 5.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 4
We came here to just try it out because our neighbors highly recommended it. We were surprised to see the variety of foods on the menu! It ranges from awesome chinese food to great thai food! My family and I really enjoyed the thai curry! It has a nice kick to it where the dish is sweet, yet salty. My husband really likes spicy foods, so they suggested the lemon grass and he loved it! Order: thai curry, lemon grass, steamed rice and more Comment (0) Presented by Nearby Restaurants: Lucky Garden Restaurants 3.5 stars 14 reviews 519-743-8152 101 Hazelglen Dr, Kitchener, ON, N2M5A2 Flying Dog The 519-886-7777 341 Marsland Dr, Waterloo, ON, N2J3Z2
1 Review 5 months ago Really good food, great for parties with friends... Reviewed by kevin Overall 5.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 5.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 5
Really good food, great for parties with friends and family. The party trays are really convenient. I also really liked how I saved money for purchasing the party tray! Order: chicken fried rice, seseme chicken and more Comment (0) 1 Review 5 months ago I was going to go to the Chinese restaurant near... Reviewed by nomnomfood Overall 4.0 stars Food 4.0 stars Services 5.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 3
I was going to go to the Chinese restaurant near downtown Kitchener but they were full, so I decided to try here because my friend highly suggested it. Making that change was a really good decision! You can tell the restaurant is family owned and has a really warm feeling when entering. The food is scrumptious, definitely comparable to the one restaurant downtown! Maybe even better! Highly recommend to others! Order: Pad Thai, Spring Roll, Kungpo Chicken Comment (0) 1 Review 5 months ago Got Food Poison Reviewed by tony Overall 1.0 star Food 1.0 star Services 1.0 star Atmosphere 1.0 star
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: No Party Size: 2
I felt that I should write a review based on my experience from Sat dinner. After having their food I was awake whole night from loose motion and whole day Sunday. Looks like I got served old foods that made me sick. Pls be careful with this restaurant. I'm not recommending and I'm not visiting again to their restaurant. Price is resonable, and the food taste like typical Mall Chinese food. Order: dinner for 2 , soup, chicken fried rice, beef brocoli, garlic chicken. Comment (0) 1 Review 10 months ago Aieeeh good! Reviewed by jon1973 Overall 4.0 stars Food 4.0 stars Services 3.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $61-$100 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 4
Best Chinese Canadian food in town. It beats the crap @UWaterloo hands down. Do try their pad Thai and chicken fried rice, as well as the egg rolls. Worth the $$$ I make as prof! Order: Chicken fried rice, general tso chicken Comment (0) 1 Review 10 months ago Best of the Best Reviewed by Steven1 Overall 5.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 5.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 2
Excellent spring rolls and chow mein. Excellent service. And the price for my order was excellent too. Best Chinese restaurant in Waterloo. I will be telling all my friends from Toronto. Definitely worth the visit. Order: Spring rolls, Cantonese Chow Mein Comment (0) 1 Review 10 months ago Professional service Reviewed by KitchenerFoodie159 Overall 4.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 4.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 2
By far this is the best restaurant for Thai food, and I am a very picky eater myself. If you like spicy food order the Lemon Grass its got a nice kick to it. The place is small but warm feeling. Order: Lemon Grass Comment (0) 1 Review 10 months ago Great food by kind people! Reviewed by SusanC Overall 5.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 5.0 stars Atmosphere 5.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $11-$25 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 3
I am from Toronto and I was dropping off my kids that just recently moved into the campus of Wilfred Laurier. The food is absolutely delicious, I would prefer my kids eating here than any fast food restaurant. The staff was very kind and helped me get to know around town better too! Order: Spring Rolls, Beef with Mixed Vegetables, Rice Comment (0) 2 Reviews 11 months ago Best In Town! Reviewed by Chuckn Overall 4.0 stars Food 5.0 stars Services 4.0 stars Atmosphere 4.0 stars
Price Range (per person): $0-$10 Visit Again?: Yes Party Size: 4
The place has awesome food and prices really sick! I could eat here everyday! Best Chinese Food west of Toronto! Try it and you will fall in love with it! Order: Fried rice and pad Thai...and root beer.
